sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The libmikmod package contains libmikmod-config and the libmikmod library.

sect3.title: libmikmod-config
sect3.para: libmikmod-config provides version information, compiler and linker flags to programs that utilize libmikmod.

sect3.title: libmikmod
sect3.para: libmikmod provides the functionality that is required to play various tracker module files.
